top_comments.comment: This video contradicts everything u have said in the past.the jeans looks bad bulky on the bottom make u look shorter.the boots I understand. But u loved chealse boots.the jacket for chubby people make the look even fatter
I didn’t  see a single dude wearing Chelsea boots when I went out last weekend lol. Idk maybe it’s because I’m from dallas lol. We rock cowboy boots here . 🤠
I personally opt for some grey robes… matches my beard and hat.

Denim Jacket and Chelsea Boots are so played out imo. Everyone is wearing them. Maybe switch up the denim jacket with a corduroy trucker and the Chelsea boot with a lace-up boot, preferably with grooved outsoles for winter. Again, this is my opinion🙏🏽

comments_since_last_sample.body: Let me see if I understand this, you want us to buy stuff from H&M(the most accessible store in the world), wear items that “designers are pumping out like crazy” in order to stand out? Stand out by wearing what everyone else is wearing. Flawless
Just stick with classic pieces for the majority of your wardrobe, and call it a day! 😐
I disagree with all your choices! flannels are a MUST for fall! what  is wrong with you bro!?! I wear what I like .. end of discussion 😬
Where am from, more people Wear quilted puffer jackets than bombers. So wearing a puffer won't make you stand out.

Denim Jacket and Chelsea Boots are so played out imo. Everyone is wearing them. Maybe switch up the denim jacket with a corduroy trucker and the Chelsea boot with a lace-up boot, preferably with grooved outsoles for winter. Again, this is my opinion🙏🏽
